Nutrition Home Nutrition Eating healthy at fast food restaurants Pick the low-fat choices Pick the low-fat choices
For each question, pick the lowest-fat choice between the common fast food items:
1.
Grilled chicken sandwich
-or-
Fish fillet sandwich
2.
Bacon cheeseburger sandwich
-or-
Lean roast beef sandwich
3.
Turkey sub with mustard
-or-
Tuna salad sub
4.
French fries
-or-
Baked potato
